• Influencer: Isabella Garcia
            • Brand: Amart Furniture
            • Fee: ~$30,690
            • Deliverables: 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x LinkedIn post, 3 x YouTube short, 1 x Media interview, 3 x 2-minute tutorial

            • Usage: 7 months
